author: andschwa
body:
These non-CI tests are failing on Linux (perhaps also on OS X and Windows, as yet untested):

```
Describing Get-RunspaceDebug
   Context Check return types of RunspaceDebug
Get-RunspaceDebug : No debugger was found for Runspace Runspace13.
At /home/andrew/src/PowerShell/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Get-RunspaceDebug.Tests.ps1:6 char:12
+         $rs = Get-RunspaceDebug
+               ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : InvalidOperation: (Microsoft.Power...aceDebugCommand:GetRunspaceDebugCommand) [Get-Runspace
Debug], PSInvalidOperationException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : RunspaceDebugOptionNoDebugger,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetRunspaceDebugCommand

Get-RunspaceDebug : No debugger was found for Runspace Runspace23.
At /home/andrew/src/PowerShell/test/powershell/Modules/Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility/Get-RunspaceDebug.Tests.ps1:6 char:12
+         $rs = Get-RunspaceDebug
+               ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : InvalidOperation: (Microsoft.Power...aceDebugCommand:GetRunspaceDebugCommand) [Get-Runspace
Debug], PSInvalidOperationException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : RunspaceDebugOptionNoDebugger,Microsoft.PowerShell.Commands.GetRunspaceDebugCommand

    [+] Should return Microsoft.Powershell.Commands.PSRunspaceDebug as the return type 48ms

Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.0.0-alpha
PSEdition                      Core
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-alpha.7-335-g4c830d5e327b34c7bf8b92d3a67c4e2250c2edee
CLRVersion
WSManStackVersion              3.0
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
```

/cc @JamesWTruher
title: Get-RunspaceDebug test failure
